root.title: Root
root.desc: The generating note of the chord, the reference point from which all intervals are calculated.

thirds.title: Modal Area (3rd/Sus)
thirds.desc: Defines the mode (Major/Minor) or suspension. Includes Major 2nd, Minor 3rd, Major 3rd and Perfect 4th.

fifths.title: Stability Area (5th)
fifths.desc: Determines stability or tension. Includes Tritone (dim), Perfect 5th and Augmented 5th (aug).

sevenths.title: Functional Area (7th)
sevenths.desc: Defines harmonic function. Includes Major 6th (or dim 7th), Minor 7th and Major 7th.
